website_summaries.verdict: Precise fit based on the weight and leg length of your small dog, which helps with mobility.
pros: Multiple size options ensure that you can find just the right fit for your small dog
Aluminum frame doesn't weigh much, so it won't weigh your dog down, but it's extremely durable
Uses rubber-treaded foam wheels, so they won't go flat
cons: Only designed for dogs weighing 11 to 25 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Will not get FULL refund back
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the product, I was excited to put things together and get my dog started on his wheelchair. My 16 year old dachshund was diagnosed with IVDD and had trouble balancing while walking. I was hoping that the wheelchair would make taking potty breaks a little bit easier. After setting it up and getting him into his harness/vest, I noticed that the wheel chair was too heavy for him to walk with so I decided to return it. Be aware that you will not receive a full refund if you open and try on the product. I, unfortunately, only received 68% of my money back due to the fact that I opened and set the wheelchair up.
customer_reviews.author: Khoa

customer_reviews.title: WALKIN' HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product with lots of adjustment-flexibility for perfect fit. The size "Small with 8 inch wheels" fit rescued 4 year old Pug, Chewy. As soon as Chewy was in his harness he was off exploring inside and outdoors. Narrow wheelbase made turning easy, especially in the hallway. It was great to see how happy he was. With just one week's practice, Chewy walked over a mile in our 2016 Veterans Day Parade. He really enjoyed meeting all the children along the parade route. PROS: Quality built, engineered for safety, lots of flexibility for perfect fit, had full collar, choice of wheels. CON: Price
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL K

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty easy to get on once put together and very ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with this purchase. It is pretty easy to get on once put together and very customizable. Moni went paralyzed suddenly and she was so tired of not being as mobile and took to this very quickly... then, anti inflammatory meds helped her to regain most of her mobility in a couple of weeks... however we have so much comfort knowing we have this for next time. Even though she wasn't fully used to it, she wanted in it. And even found a way to take a nap in it haha! We could not be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: A True Blessing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Changed my pugs life!! Poe is back to his old spunky self. A slipped disc took his back legs from him, he's been dragging them for months now, but with this wheelchair he can run and play like he used to. He took to it like he's always had it.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built wheel chair. Needed to buy the front support for dogs with weak front legs as well as back legs. Our dog, Toby, gets very excited about getting in the chair. We sometimes put him in to eat his meals, that way he doesn't flop over while eating! Only problem we have is that the front swivel wheels get stuck when he wants to go across the lawn. Just wish we had bought this a year or two earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma Bee

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fit my dog appropriately, even after several adjustments. Bought through Amazon because I’ve always gotten a full refund. However, the wheelchair company handles refund and took over $100 from the refund. We put it on the dog twice and he only moved a few feet in our living room. Dog doesn’t shed, so not sure of their excuse to keep so much for the return. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BCarter

customer_reviews.title: It has been working very well we also bought a dachshund harness - which works better than the harness that comes with it for a
customer_reviews.text: Our doxie became suddently paralyzed and was dragging his feet behind him. Immediately we looked into several different carts and chose this one. It has been working very well we also bought a dachshund harness - which works better than the harness that comes with it for a dachshund. Our dog is still adjusting to the cart - coaxing him to walk by feeding him small treats and making him walk.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A.

customer_reviews.title: bulky, hard to assemble and when returned, the ...
customer_reviews.text: bulky, hard to assemble and when returned, the seller only returned $137 of the $200 that I paid for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Lvr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This wheelchair is amazing! My doxies back legs were paralyzed and it gave him the freedom to go out and play and go potty on his own. He is now able to walk again!! I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dog's Wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dog wheelchair!!! My dachshund is able to use it on my stepping stones, garage and cement parking pad outside the garage. My grass is not the greatest so she does not navigate well in it. I have not used it daily because of our very high temperatures here really bothered her. When it gets cooler I am sure she will be moving around following the other dachshunds. It's a good wheelchair that you adjust to fit your dog's size and needs. Best that I have seen!!!
customer_reviews.author: DALE

customer_reviews.title: If your dogs is paralyzed or has limited mobility buy this chair.
customer_reviews.text: Completely worth the purchase price! Our dogs is once again enjoying the freedom to move about on his own. His tail is wagging again! If your dogs is paralyzed or has limited mobility you and your pet will both benefit from a Walkin' Wheels wheelchair. Easy to adjust. You can quickly and easily get your pets into the chair(based on use with a small dog). Our dog took 2-4 days to get comfortable with moving about in the chair. He has been using the chair for 2 months now and we occasionally have to tell him to slow down. He zooms about like Evel Knievel. He loves it and I love that! : )
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: A happy purchase for sad times
customer_reviews.text: Our dachshund broke a couple of discs two days before Christmas and paralyzed his back end. He went through surgery and is now on a slow road to (hopefully) full recovery. We use this wheelchair as part of his physical therapy because it allows him to exercise his back legs. It's really a great chair - it gives him full mobility. He can run around inside and out and even play fetch when he's in the chair. We definitely feel we got value out of this purchase - seeing our doggies completely mobile again was priceless!
customer_reviews.author: John E

customer_reviews.title: 2 wheels vs 4 wheels
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you evaluate your pet to know if you need 2 or 4 wheels. I bought 2 wheels. Realized I needed 4. Amazon didn’t sell the 2 front wheels alone so had to go directly to company. It ended up costing over $500.00 but it worked well. We have 2 special needs pups so we waited on the second chair till we tested the first to see if it worked out. We ended up buying a second chair with 4 wheels & it cost slightly over half price of the first. Soooooooo, long story short. Buy 4 wheels if your pup has balance problems. Both pups love their chairs. It really exercises and strengthens their legs.
customer_reviews.author: KAllen

customer_reviews.title: mobility
customer_reviews.text: Han is getting use to this. It took a few days. The first harness broke within 30 days but walkin provided a replacement. It's great seeing Han run sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST THING IVE EVER PURCHASED!
customer_reviews.text: THIS WHEEL CHAIR GIVES MY PUG BELLA A NEW START ON LIFE. SHE CAN MOVE RIGHT ALONG AND KEEP UP WITH THE OTHER DOGS. TRULY A LIFE CHANGING LIFE EXTENDING PIECE OF EQUIPMENT. MY GIRL TOOK RIGHT TO IT WITHOUT ANY TROUBLE. AND YES THE CAN DO THEIR BUSINESS NO PROBLEM. IT IS EASY TO PUT HER IN HER WHEELS THE HARNESS SNAPS RIGHT ON THE CHAIR. IT ALSO MAKES YOU FEEL SO GOOD TO SEE YOUR BEST FRIEND TAKE OFF IN HER WHEELS. IF YOU HAVE A SPECIAL NEEDS DOG THIS IS WHAT U NEED TO CHANGE THEIR LIFE AND HAVE THEM WITH YOU A LITTLE LONGER
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Well made, but very heavy for a small elderly dog. My dog couldn't walk because it was too heavy and very hard to harness. Researched, and even took some classes on PT to help her, but she fell forward way too many times so never used it again.
customer_reviews.author: eri1mar

customer_reviews.title: It’s wonderful to be able to walk the dog again
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect accessory for my Pug. He lost use of his back legs due to arthritis. Granted it took a few trials and errors until I feel that it properly fit my dog. He is getting exercise again and loving it. Every day he gets a little more endurance and we are able to go on longer walks.
customer_reviews.author: TG West

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for my Frenchie!
customer_reviews.text: Great wheelchair, have had others but this one is by far the best! Got the small pink one for my French bulldog. She is VERY bulky in her front (all from muscle), about 27 lbs, and much longer and bigger than other frenchies. She slipped a disk in her spine when she was 2 (had her all her life) she is now 7 and finally back in a good wheelchair that she doesn’t hate! It fits her well, this wheelchair has MULTIPLE adjustments! The only problem is the harness is alittle tight in the front but shouldn’t be to hard to fix with changing out the strap. Again she is bulky because she drags her self in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cart for IVDD
customer_reviews.text: This cart is wonderful. My Brady recently began losing function in his back legs due to IVDD. It has taken some getting used to but I couldn't have found a better cart. Its fully adjustable so we were able to find the perfect fit. It gives support and is easy to move around in. At first Brady used his back legs some, so this allowed him to keep using them with added support. Now he drags his legs so we added the provided stirrups. Also the price was reasonable, especially for something so sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your dog has trouble with the front legs too, don't order this.  Too heavy!
customer_reviews.text: It was suppose to support my dog because her back legs are useless pretty much. Too much stress on the front legs is what you have to remember. Sent it back and lost $70. Never used it, just took it out of the packaging and because I did that, they took $70 off my return amount. Just very disappointed that I cannot help my little girl walk. Heart breaking is what it is and I will never order anything else from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Mom

customer_reviews.title: My Pug loves it
customer_reviews.text: My lovely little pug's back legs just were not able to support her anymore. I decided to get these wheels for her and they worked great. A little setup time to get the fit right and I put her in it. In less than 1 minute she was off and moving. I can tell she really likes the mobility she has now. She can go for walks on smooth pavement, rock or even "off road" in dusty dirt with large "off-road" wheels. I am so happy I got it for her. Now that I have practiced I can get her in in it 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m still crying! My pug just celebrated her 15th birthday!!! Her dreams of independence and dignity and back and she is so happy again!!! I couldn’t ask for more. Honestly my dogs are my children and I would do anything for them but this was a huge cost at a gamble to as to whether it would work or not! I’m so glad I did this for her and me! One day I will pass it on....
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: The customer service is excellent. I had a few problems getting it right ...
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is excellent. I had a few problems getting it right but eventually set it up correctly for my Pug. She is now walking so much better due to this gadget!
customer_reviews.author: Firebird Girl

customer_reviews.title: wheels to no where
customer_reviews.text: My sisters dog hates getting in the thing. She wont move a lick. I wonder if its the fit and how to adjust. It really needs video instruction but just checked out you tube. So two stars cause its not working using strap to carry back parts is best.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built and adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: I have an aging wire-haired fox terrier with degenerative myelopathy, and her hind legs have weakened to the point that she can barely walk. We just got the wheelchair, but I was impressed with its sturdiness and how it can be adjusted easily to the right width, height, and length. My dog is still getting used to it, -- and right now moves when enticed by treats - but she seems to be adapting well and figuring it out. I believe it will give her continued independence in movement as her legs continue to weaken. Without a product like this. I am not sure we had any other alternatives for her.
customer_reviews.author: KSH

customer_reviews.title: Paws are walking now!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my mother-in-law's miniature dachshund. Her dog has nerve damage in her spine causing paralysis in her back legs, so this enables the dog to move about and relieve herself a few times a day. READ THE MANUAL! I cannot stress it enough. It is the best user's guide for fit and use. Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Another humble opinion...

customer_reviews.title: ... little guy a few more weeks that he fully enjoyed. Would do it all again even though his ...
customer_reviews.text: This gave our little guy a few more weeks that he fully enjoyed. Would do it all again even though his condition eventually took him for good.
customer_reviews.author: Dotcommom

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's super cute! The dog is just starting to lose mobility in the rear, so this helps when going on longer walks for the most part. Only downside was the initial assembly. Though I didn't get to participate in it from the beginning, it seemed like it wasn't as easy or clear to put together, resulting in some hearty laughs, but it worked out in the end. The dog wasn't too happy at first, but once he figured it out, he just took off on it (until he ran into something). Also, not that easy to store or pack up, kinda bulky.
customer_reviews.author: R. Abz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this wheelchair. Easy to assemble and easy to adjust. Purchased for my 10lb terrier with severe lower back trauma. He can choose to try to use his legs or use the stirrups instead. Comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, I only had it a couple of weeks but I feel that it is helping my dog get better. I was told by the vet that he probably won’t regain movement on his back legs but w some chiropractic help and exercises, he is getting better. Slowly but better. The wheelchair helps keep his body in alignment and the straps in the back help him move his legs. But it also allows him to move around. I only wish it was put together when they send it to you. It was a little confusing trying to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Zepek

customer_reviews.title: Safe sturdy and works
customer_reviews.text: It took me time and patience to figure out the assembly. It wasnt easy. Practice for sure a few times to get your pet in and out of the chair. It works really well though. I'm looking forward to nicer weather and getting her back to neighborhood walks.
customer_reviews.author: quitfrontine

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for our 13 year old dog with hind leg issues. We have had for just over two weeks now and he is adjusting. Although we are doing a lot of coaxing with treats, he moves around very easily. He is walking from room to room also. He is able to get a drink when he wants, and he also eats his meals while in the cart. We are looking forward to the nicer weather so he can enjoy being outdoors and just roaming around
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary L Barrett

customer_reviews.title: First impression on wheelchair was that it was a rock ...
customer_reviews.text: First impression on wheelchair was that it was a rock solid setup. Put my dachshund in it and he started getting use to it. Not even a hour into him using it the stitching came out on the chest harnessing the side where in clips onto chair...... not impressed now after how much this product cost.
customer_reviews.author: damon crabb

customer_reviews.title: Good material, well constructed and works great for long ...
customer_reviews.text: Good material, well constructed and works great for long walks but I didn't find it practical for all around use. It's probably just me but at 68 I found it to complex to attach to the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money, but difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is still getting use to the chair which all dogs will need to, but once he gets going I think this will be a great wheelchair for him. The instruction manual definitely needs some improvements. There are no step by step instructions they are scattered all over. I had to watch a video on YouTube to make sure I had everything correct. Other than that I am very pleased with this wheelchair for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy joyce

customer_reviews.title: This cart is perfect! It is a blessing for my little Gertrude
customer_reviews.text: This cart is perfect! It is a blessing for my little Gertrude! She took off like a shot the 1st time out in the park and is still working on getting her strength up...so happy with the easy adjustment for sizing and the results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to put together. Did not even use.
customer_reviews.text: Returned product did not use. Too hard to put everything together. Waiting on refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: Quality chair for you baby.
customer_reviews.text: My weinner dog woke up and couldn't use his back legs. After being told surgery would be about 10G we looked into this option. He now no longer needs to use this chair, I think the stress it took off his back was just what he needed to relive the pressure to walk again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Porath

customer_reviews.title: Great Wheels, we have hope again!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the Walkin Wheels after reading lots of reviews on various brands of wheels. They have been great so far after making a few adjustments to fit our pug Millie. She has gotten increasingly weaker in her back legs in recent months. So far so good !
customer_reviews.author: Tami J Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates it
customer_reviews.text: Dog does not enjoy it. It is hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Well, it was so complicated to installed and my Pug couldn't even use it. he looks really uncomfortable and hurt
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Liem

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: oh This has made such a difference in our pug's life! He now has the ability to run around and go for walks. Very easy to put together, fully adjustable to use if needed for other size dogs. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: catchoo

customer_reviews.title: Got my legs
customer_reviews.text: My baby can walk comfortably , her tail wags continuously . I did buy the better harness and it works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Quite easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I admit I did not put it together so I don't know how easy/difficult it may have been, but it is easy to put on my French Bulldog Sasha, who has not minded it one bit. However, she still isn't too sure about walking any distance with it, not yet realizing how much easier it is for her to do so. My one complaint is that there is no place to attach a leash, which may be the reason she is not walking much in it.
customer_reviews.author: elinor beirne

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome product, however my Pug refused to use it. At no fault of the seller or product. I would definitely recommend this wheelchair. Very sturdy and came with all possible attachments to make it comfortable. Having a senile Pug, unfortunately I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Haun

customer_reviews.title: Not for pugs
customer_reviews.text: My dog wouldn't take to it. Too wobbly and just not enough belly support. I have a pug. And when I went to return the company was trying to keep $100 restocking fee 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Staheli

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Everything down to the harness is complicated. The dog will be agitated and there are no refunds once you open the box. There are some simpler and cheaper doggie wheelchairs on Amazon. Don't pay the $200+ for this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great W/C for dogs if you need one
customer_reviews.text: Sent this back because my vet didn’t think it was necessary at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Bella

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my older miniature dachshund who cannot use his back legs. This allows Ziggy to go out for walks, and he seems to like it. It gives him mobility and forces him on some levels to use his back legs which is critical for him. It took some tweaking to get the settings that would work for him, but I think we are there. The instruction manual and video were very helpful. The price is very good compared to what the vet specialist would be charging. Everyday we are able to walk a little further, and Ziggy enjoys being out and able to smell the squirrels in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Bialy

customer_reviews.title: So happy to see my Bo walk again.
customer_reviews.text: My Bo took right to this So happy to see him walk again. Easy to assemble and adjust to customize fit.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 12 lb dog who has arthritis in her hips and knees. Makes long walks much easier and faster
customer_reviews.author: ZOEY.D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard of and seen wheelchairs for pets but didn't think I would need one. Walkin' Wheels is a great product. It's well made and fairly easy to adjust to your pet's needs. The cost if not as much as I had thought and my little puggy girl can get around again. Thank you to the people that designed and manufacture Walkin' Wheels!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it..
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Not sturdy. Not easy to put together and hard to put your dog in it. Plus expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Filipek

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Frenchie Charlie. He has IVDD and we are hoping he recovers and is able to walk again. This wheel chair has helped him to use his muscles and provide physical therapy for him. He is so happy every time we bring it out. I would recommend this wheel chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. My pug has spinal cord damage. These wheels made him so happy he took to them instantly. I can't keep up with him sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: It took our elderly pug a little bit to get used to using his wheels, but after a couple weeks of training, he LOVES them and relies on them. He gets to move around as he wishes again! The assembly directions can be a little confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to connect with dog. Set up was impossible for amateur.
customer_reviews.author: Shoeaddict

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just wished I found this win the dog was younger
customer_reviews.author: Norma Alsup

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. My French Bulldog loves his wheels. Gave him a new lease of life.
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This chair was so well made and easy to put together. We loved it, but our little Steffi was in it one day and like a miracle started walking again!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lopitz

customer_reviews.title: Good wheels for our senior pug
customer_reviews.text: Great doggie wheels for our 14 yr old pug. Easy to assemble, sturdy, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Honara L Rohovit

customer_reviews.title: Built well,very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty,well built... took the dog about 3 days of practice..then off she went.
customer_reviews.author: David Jung

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Paralyzed Dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dachshund/Corgi/Terrier cross with IVDD who ruptured a disc in his spine and had surgery. His back feet no longer function. The cart is perfect. He can follow me around the house, go for walks and chase balls again. He is so happy. It was easy to assemble and easy to get him into.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these wheels! It gave my chihuahua the opportunity to normality again :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Walkin' wheels dog wheelchair xxsmall, pink
customer_reviews.text: This is really well made but so far I haven't had to use this but I' ve got it in case. My little chihuahua Zoe has CHF so she is getting weaker in her back hind legs.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for the dog wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: I got this when we decided to foster a special need dachshund. The poor girl came into rescue in horrible state. This dog wheelchair fits her perfectly and well made.
customer_reviews.author: MAI-TRAM NGUYEN

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: too big and bulky for my small dog - I paid it forward and gifted it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Lvngwell

customer_reviews.title: I am completely impressed with this wheelchair. My dog’s ...
customer_reviews.text: I am completely impressed with this wheelchair. My dog’s back legs are paralysed and this wheelchair accommodates her very well. This wheelchair is very well made and adjusts in length, width, and height! To ensure a proper fit for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McKee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and stays on.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on our medium size shih-tzu, bought a less expensive one that fell apart and never stayed fastened.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Missing WHEELS
customer_reviews.text: This arrived sooner than expected but when I unpacked the parts the WHEELS are MISSING. My heart sank! The frame felt pretty heavy-I am curious how that will feel on my lil old man once a replacement arrives.
customer_reviews.author: SitStayHeal

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly only if you get the right size for your dog. So it's highly important you get the measurement down before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Doggie whelchair
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to adjust to my daschund and he loves it...
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McCleary

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works good
customer_reviews.text: Works great needs lot of training for dog to get use to it but quality and design are A+
customer_reviews.author: Omid

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: My Sugar girl loved it! As soon as we put it on her she was moving and wagging her tail! It was easy to put together and it helped out my 10 year old 3 legged shih tzu immensely.
customer_reviews.author: marlou

customer_reviews.title: It was hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: We had to adjust and readjust to make it just right. We had a new harness made that was more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Smith

customer_reviews.title: This was a life saver!
customer_reviews.text: We just received the wheelchair and our eskie took right to it. We all had tears in our eyes watching him walk again. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME MADE, BUT MY DOG HATES THEM. GOING TO HAVE TO RETURN OR SALE
customer_reviews.author: Jody Lamb

customer_reviews.title: very happy with the dog wheelchair she has never been on ...
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the dog wheelchair she has never been on a leash so it is taking her sometime to realize she can use her front legs to walk with this. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Takes time to train the dog to use it.
customer_reviews.text: The product was perfect. My dog just would not use it. We put it on him he would just stand still.
customer_reviews.author: Teressa L Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wheelchair and customer service
customer_reviews.text: My dog love this wheelchair. I had a problem with the harness and they sent ne a new harness in two days. Amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: thank you
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact you can adjust to fit length and width. It feels heavy enough to take abuse from free wheeling dogs
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Gives our dog more freedom to go where she wants. Her rear legs suffer from partial paralysis.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Providing Mobility is a gift

customer_reviews.title: Three weeks in and the Oskar Mighty Wiener Dog started ...
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks in and the Oskar Mighty Wiener Dog started walking again. The chair gave him the opportunity to excersice his rear legs without weight and in time he regained most of his mobility......we just don't let him go up and down stairs or hop up or down on furniture. Saving for future use.
customer_reviews.author: vern blair

customer_reviews.title: Great support for my Best friend!
customer_reviews.text: My boy had to get used to it for a few days but he moves well and it's a really great purchase to help one of my best friends move around better. I bought this for my Mini Schnauzer and he weighs about 20 Lbs.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie kozak

customer_reviews.title: Am pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Came in mail early, which is what I needed with this handicapped dog. Am pleased with this product.

customer_reviews.text: Sad to say, my dog only got to use it once and I know he enjoyed it very much. He was a great dog. Thanks Jim

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: This piece of junk is an absolute nightmare to assemble. The "instruction manual" is the worst I've seen and didficult to comprehend- not at all user friendly. The online video shows parts that do not match what's in the box and is also shot at one, inadequate angle. I am shipping the whole crappy thing back butbof course i have to pay some kind of restocking fee. What a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Rogers

product_meta.title: Walkin' Wheels Dog Wheelchair - for Small Dogs 11-25 Pounds - Veterinarian Approved - Dog Wheelchair for Back Legs
feature_bullets: CREATES A HAPPY, HEALTHY LIFE FOR PETS & PET PARENTS! - The Walkin’ Wheels dog wheelchair gives your best friend the happy, healthy life they deserve.. Our pet wheelchair provides support for your dog’s back legs allowing them to run, play and enjoy quality time with the family.

KEEPS YOUR DOG MOBILE & COMFORTABLE - Nothing makes our pets, with limited to no mobility in their hind legs, feel loved more than being able to run, play, and explore with their family. Our wheelchair for dogs has a durable, lightweight aluminum frame that makes your dog mobile while also keeping them stable. Its dense foam wheels with rubber treads won’t puncture and they will allow your pet to explore all types of terrain.

EASY TO STORE, TRANSPORT, AND CLEAN - Our Small dog wheelchairs can fit easily into your car when your family travels or to conveniently store when not in use. Additionally, all of the pet wheelchair parts are washable including the foam/rubber wheels making it easy to clean.

PATENTED ADJUSTABLE DESIGN FOR THE PERFECT FIT - Walkin’ Wheels’ rear support dog wheelchairs feature our patented adjustable design making it the only dog wheel cart that can be tailored to your dog’s size and changing health. This wheelchair for dogs is also adjustable in height, length, and width ensuring that your pet is both mobile and comfortable throughout their life stages.

VETERINARIAN APPROVED - Many Veterinary professionals have spoken about the positive impact that the Walkin Wheels have had on their clients. By helping their patients stay mobile despite their limitations, these pet wheelchairs allow them to remain active and maintain a great quality of life. Our pet wheelchair provides support for dog’s hind legs making it suitable for injured or disabled pets as well as dogs with limited mobility due to age.
